TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class HierarchicalDataSourceControl : System.Web.UI.Control, System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource
.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit HierarchicalDataSourceControl extends System.Web.UI.Control implements class System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource
Public MustInherit Class HierarchicalDataSourceControl Inherits Control Implements IHierarchicalDataSource
public ref class HierarchicalDataSourceControl abstract : System::Web::UI::Control, System::Web::UI::IHierarchicalDataSource
type HierarchicalDataSourceControl = class inherit Control interface IHierarchicalDataSource

summary.span: 为表示分层数据的数据源控件提供基类。

span.span: Provides a base class for data source controls that represent hierarchical data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 支持的控件数据绑定体系结构，使 Web 服务器控件能够绑定到数据并以一致的方式呈现数据。ASP.NET supports a controls data-binding architecture that enables Web server controls to bind to data and present it in a consistent fashion. 将绑定到数据的 web 服务器控件调用数据绑定控件，并帮助绑定的类称为数据源控件。Web server controls that bind to data are called data-bound controls, and the classes that facilitate binding are called data source controls. 数据源控件可以表示任何数据源： 文件、 流、 关系数据库、 业务对象等。Data source controls can represent any data source: a file, a stream, a relational database, a business object, and so on. 数据源控件数据绑定控件，而不考虑源或基础数据的格式一致的方式呈现数据。Data source controls present data in a consistent way to data-bound controls, regardless of the source or format of the underlying data. 表示分层数据的数据源控件派生自类，而表示列表或表的数据的数据源控件派生自类。Data source controls that represent hierarchical data derive from the class, while data source controls that represent lists or tables of data derive from the class. 类是基实现接口，定义用于检索与数据源控件关联的分层数据源视图对象的单一方法， 。The class is the base implementation of the interface, which defines a single method to retrieve hierarchical data source view objects associated with the data source control, . 您可以将数据源控件的组合视为对象和名为数据源视图对象对基础数据及其关联的视图。You can think of a data source control as the combination of the object and its associated views on the underlying data, called data source view objects. 通常只有一个命名视图，与关联表示表格数据的数据源控件时类为每个数据源控件表示的分层数据层支持的数据源视图。While data source controls that represent tabular data are typically associated with only one named view, the class supports a data source view for each level of hierarchical data that the data source control represents. 分层数据的级别由唯一的分层路径，传递给中的方法`viewPath`参数。The level of hierarchical data is identified by a unique hierarchical path, passed to the method in the `viewPath` parameter. 每个对象定义的层次结构级别表示，数据源控件的功能，并执行插入、 更新、 删除和排序等操作。Each object defines the capabilities of a data source control for the hierarchical level represented, and performs operations such as insert, update, delete, and sort. Web 服务器控件派生自类，如，使用分层数据源控件绑定到分层数据。Web server controls that derive from the class, such as , use hierarchical data source controls to bind to hierarchical data. 数据源控件将作为控件启用声明性持久性并选择允许参与状态管理。Data source controls are implemented as controls to enable declarative persistence and to optionally permit participation in state management. 数据源控件具有没有可视化呈现，并因此不支持主题。Data source controls have no visual rendering, and therefore do not support themes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展抽象类和类，并实现和接口，用于创建分层数据源中检索文件系统的控件信息。The following code example demonstrates how to extend the abstract class and the class, and implement the and interfaces to create a hierarchical data source control that retrieves file system information. `FileSystemDataSource`控制使 Web 服务器控件将绑定到对象，并显示基本文件系统信息。The `FileSystemDataSource` control enables Web server controls to bind to objects and display basic file system information. `FileSystemDataSource`类在示例中提供的实现方法，检索`FileSystemDataSourceView`对象。The `FileSystemDataSource` class in the example provides the implementation of the method, which retrieves a `FileSystemDataSourceView` object. `FileSystemDataSourceView`对象从基础数据存储，在此情况下在 Web 服务器上的文件系统信息中检索数据。The `FileSystemDataSourceView` object retrieves the data from the underlying data storage, in this case the file system information on the Web server. 出于安全目的，文件系统信息在 localhost 中正在使用的数据源控件时，才会显示、 身份验证方案中，并仅启动使用数据源控件的 Web 窗体页所驻留的虚拟目录。For security purposes, file system information is displayed only if the data source control is being used in a localhost, authenticated scenario, and only starts with the virtual directory that the Web Forms page using the data source control resides in. 最后，两个类实现并提供包装对象的`FileSystemDataSource`使用。Finally, two classes that implement and are provided to wrap the objects that `FileSystemDataSource` uses. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/CS/filesystemdatasource.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/VB/filesystemdatasource.vb#2)] 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式将绑定控制对文件系统数据使用`FileSystemDataSource`示例。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively bind a control to file system data using the `FileSystemDataSource` example. [!code-aspx-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_webform_1#50](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_webform_1/CS/webform7cs.aspx#50)] [!code-aspx-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_webform_1#50](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_webform_1/VB/webform7vb.aspx#50)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这方法提供的默认实现类，只需返回`null`。This method provides the default implementation for the class, which simply returns `null`. 派生的类类重写此方法并提供一个实现以返回派生的强类型化的视图。Classes that derive from the class override this method and provide an implementation to return a strongly typed view that derives from . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写中的类来扩展方法类以返回强类型化对象。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a class that extends the class to return a strongly typed object. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/CS/filesystemdatasource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/VB/filesystemdatasource.vb#1)]

span.span: An that contains event data.
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通知数据绑定控件的基础数据源或在内存中缓存的数据已更改，该控件应该重新绑定，且应执行任何必要的工作。The method notifies a data-bound control that the underlying data source or the data cached in memory has changed, that the control should rebind, and that any necessary work should be performed. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: Custom Event DataSourceChanged As EventHandler Implements System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource

summary.span: 更改 的方式对数据绑定控件产生一定影响时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the has changed in some way that affects data-bound controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 引发事件时数据绑定控件或基础数据的属性已更改以某种影响数据绑定控件和其数据之间的数据绑定的方式。The event is raised when the properties of a data-bound control or the underlying data has changed in some way that affects the data bindings between a data-bound control and its data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 客户端调用方法时操作作为接口。The method is called by clients when a is manipulated as an interface. 委托给方法，派生类重写以返回强类型化对象。It delegates to the method, which derived classes override to return strongly typed objects.
